about.title: About Nafsiatak
about.description: Dedicated to providing compassionate, evidence-based psychological care for individuals, couples, and families.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: Our mission is to provide compassionate, evidence-based psychological services that empower individuals to overcome challenges, heal from trauma, and achieve their full potential.
mission.text2: We are committed to creating a safe, supportive environment where clients feel heard, understood, and valued. Our team of experienced professionals uses the latest research and therapeutic techniques to help you navigate life's challenges and build resilience.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our experienced team of licensed psychologists and therapists are here to support your mental health journey.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide our practice and shape our approach to mental health care.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We approach every client with empathy, understanding, and genuine care for their well-being.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards of professional practice and continuous learning.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We uphold the highest ethical standards and maintain complete confidentiality.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work together with clients to develop personalized treatment plans and goals.

contact.subject: Inquiry about service: {{serviceName}}

hero.title: Your Journey to Mental Wellness Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Professional psychological services to help you overcome challenges, heal, and thrive in life.

features.title: Why Choose Nafsiatak?
features.subtitle: We are committed to providing the highest quality psychological care in a supportive and professional environment.

compassionateCare.title: Compassionate Care
compassionateCare.description: We provide warm, empathetic care in a safe and supportive environment.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our licensed psychologists have years of experience in various therapeutic approaches.

evidenceBased.title: Evidence-Based
evidenceBased.description: We use scientifically proven methods to help you achieve lasting positive change.

confidential.title: Confidential
confidential.description: Your privacy and confidentiality are our top priorities.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive psychological services tailored to your unique needs and goals.

individualTherapy.title: Individual Therapy
individualTherapy.description: One-on-one therapy sessions to address personal challenges and promote growth.

couplesTherapy.title: Couples Therapy
couplesTherapy.description: Strengthen your relationship through effective communication and understanding.

familyTherapy.title: Family Therapy
familyTherapy.description: Improve family dynamics and resolve conflicts in a supportive environment.

individualtherapy.description: One-on-one therapy sessions tailored to your specific needs and goals.

couplestherapy.description: Specialized therapy for couples to improve communication and strengthen relationships.

familytherapy.description: Therapy sessions for families to improve communication and resolve conflicts.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from people who have transformed their lives with our help.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: Nafsiatak helped me overcome my anxiety and find inner peace. The therapists are truly amazing.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.text: Professional, caring, and effective. I highly recommend their services for anyone seeking mental wellness.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.text: The family therapy sessions have brought our family closer together. We're so grateful for their support.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Healing Journey?
cta.subtitle: Take the first step towards better mental health and well-being. Book your appointment today.
